channel.title: Office Complex Elevator
channel.description: I was playing Office Complex and I got to the part near the end where the security guard says "The elevators out, but we can still climb." However, when you get to the elevator he just sits there. I was thinking it would be cool if he tries to jump the gap to the ladder, but his hands slip when he grabs the rung. Then the scientist in the same room could say something like "Uh, you go on ahead." This would be not only cool, but a little more realistic since usually the left over Black Mesa workers don't actually do anything to even try to escape.

item.title: Office Complex Elevator
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
that kind of question (if scientists can go into vents) has nothing to do with the office complex elevator and i’m pretty sure there’s a thread already for minor questions like that

don’t mean to minimod, but i hate opening a thread thinking its new and seeing its just an ancient one with an entirely useless bump added to it

EDIT: okay, this was in response to several posts that no longer seem to be in this thread

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex Elevator
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
OMG the thread revived from the shadows!

Uhm, boy those new habillities will not include crawl in vents. Sorry boy but knowing the hl2 engine they will just jump, run, shoot, shoot while running and crouch… (Maybe the devs. also added more things than that but I don’t think they will add crawl…)

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex Elevator
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Fatalfox:

like areas you had to jump to or crotch

Fatalfox:

jump to or crotch

Fatalfox:

[i][u]crotch[/i][/u]

:hmph:

If the scientists need to do so to advance gameplay then maybe, but don’t count on them getting any new abilities like crawling through vents unless its absolutely necessary.

Oh, and don’t bump old threads.

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex Elevator
item.dc:creator: Fatalfox
item.description:
Raminator:

I thought the end of Apprehension was plenty climactic. You fags are hard to please sometimes.

I was just wondering will BM be adding anything like this? You know where the Scientist and Security Guards are able to get to areas where they couldn’t go before like areas you had to jump to or crotch to get into the vents are perfect example letting the NPC’s crawl into the vents with you even if just the short ones that just connect to another room.

Read full topic

item.title: Office Complex Elevator
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
I think what Valve did in oppossing force ‘‘elevator’’ could still be done in black mesa, as a script animation. I used noclip in Op. Force and throwed some machine gun alt fire grenades and I killed the Alien slaves but the soldier did the diying animation so, yeah, my ‘‘suggestion’’ can still be done.

item.title: Office Complex Elevator
item.dc:creator: Dredile
item.description:
How about the Guard just looks over the edge of the shaft and says “Phew, actually i think ill sit this one out, you go right ahead, ill wait for some more folks to come by.”
We dont need to make it uber complicated, if its a huge gap its completley reasonable a security guard in all his equipment IE vest, gun, ammo, and helmet would sit out a 14 foot gap lol

item.title: Office Complex Elevator
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
jarms48a:

The elevator at the end of office complex does needed a change. My suggestion is when you begin to climb the original ladder you are on starts to break and when you climb to the top collapses.

I’m tired of things just breaking in games as a cheap way of making sure you can’t go back the way you came. It’s overused, and not only does it look far too contrived and obvious, but it simply wouldn’t happen in real life.

Read full topic

You already open doors with it. You smash it’s window and then crawl through it.

Not Half-Life’s style though.
